articles.author: Cory Stieg
articles.title: Could you get PTSD from your pandemic experience? The long-term mental health effects of coronavirus - CNBC
articles.description: Could the emotional toll of the Covid-19 pandemic lead to long-term mental health issues, such as post-traumatic stress disorder? Experts weigh in, and provide productive coping strategies.
articles.content:
Experiencing intense flashbacks, nightmares, irritability, anger, and fear? In the face of a traumatic event like the Covid-19 pandemic, it's common to feel this way.
While many people associate post-traumatic stress disorder with something like war, it's a … [+5397 chars]
